name: Trident Alliance
memberOrga:
Please see our website for our latest membership lists: 
http://www.tridentalliance.org/members/
goal: The Trident Alliance is a coalition of ship owners and operators in favour of effective enforcement of martime sulphur regulation and co-operates with other stakeholders to realise this objective. Robust enforcement is essential for avoiding competition disturbance (the level playing field) among ship operators and owners, considering the large financial gains of gross violation.
interests: Competition, Environment, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Single market, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives: Implementation of the Sulphur Directive (2012/33/EU) in particular enforcement of the sulphur limits for maritime fuels.
